sentences:
Jefferson Madeira da Silva , or simply Jefferson Madeira ( born 15 February 1988 ) is a Brazilian football forward playing with Duque de Caxias 
After loan spells with Metropolitano and Treze during 2008 , he joined on January 2009 FK Teleoptik - a club owned by FK Partizan Belgrade - playing in the 2008 – 09 Serbian League Belgrade playing along compatriots Washington Santana da Silva , Alex dos Santos Gonçalves and Elton Martins , helping Teleoptik to finish 2nd in the 2008 – 09 Serbian League Belgrade , one of Serbian 3rd tiers , thus earning promotion to the 2009 – 10 Serbian First League .
In summer 2009 he returned to Brazil and played until the end of the year with Olaria , before returning to Sport Recife .
